reuters.title: NESTLE TO ACQUIRE NABISCO CANADA BUSINESSES
reuters.body: Swiss-based <Nestle S.A.>'s Nestle Enterprises Ltd unit said it signed a letter of intent to acquire <Nabisco Brands Ltd>'s Club, Melrose, Dickson and Chase and Sanborn businesses for undisclosed terms. Nestle said the final agreement, subject to required approvals, would be signed shortly. The businesses involved in the deal provide products to hotels, restaurants and other parts of the food and beverage industry. Nabisco is 80 pct-owned by RJR Nabisco Inc <RJR>. Reuter 
